#
# Source files: DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE: edit CMakeListsLocal.txt instead.
#
#

SET (LOCAL_LIBRARY_BASENAME vtkEditorGeometryDraw)

INCLUDE (${VTKEDITORGEOMETRYDRAW_SOURCE_DIR}/cxx/CMakeListsLocal.txt)

# --------------------------------------------------------------------------
# You probably do not need to modify anything below this line

#
# Create the vtkEditorGeometryDraw C++ library
#
# (Doesn't work here because of a CMake bug)
# ADD_LIBRARY (vtkEditorGeometryDraw ${LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS})

#
# Create the vtkEditorGeometryDraw Tcl library
#

IF (VTK_WRAP_TCL AND VTKEDITORGEOMETRYDRAW_WRAP_TCL)

  VTK_WRAP_TCL (vtkEditorGeometryDrawTCL EditorGeometryDrawTCL_SRCS ${LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS})
  ADD_LIBRARY (vtkEditorGeometryDrawTCL ${EditorGeometryDrawTCL_SRCS})
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDrawTCL 
                         vtkEditorGeometryDraw
                         vtkIOTCL 
                         vtkGraphicsTCL 
                         vtkImagingTCL 
                         vtkFilteringTCL 
                         vtkCommonTCL
                         ${TCL_LIBRARY})
  IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDrawTCL vtkHybridTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

  IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDrawTCL vtkParallelTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

  IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDrawTCL vtkPatentedTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

  IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDrawTCL vtkRenderingTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)

ENDIF (VTK_WRAP_TCL AND VTKEDITORGEOMETRYDRAW_WRAP_TCL)

#
# Create the vtkEditorGeometryDraw Python library
#

IF (VTK_WRAP_PYTHON AND VTKEDITORGEOMETRYDRAW_WRAP_PYTHON)

  VTK_WRAP_PYTHON (vtkEditorGeometryDrawPython EditorGeometryDrawPython_SRCS ${LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS})

  IF (APPLE)
    ADD_LIBRARY (vtkEditorGeometryDrawPython MODULE ${EditorGeometryDrawPython_SRCS})
  ELSE (APPLE)
    ADD_LIBRARY (vtkEditorGeometryDrawPython SHARED ${EditorGeometryDrawPython_SRCS})
  ENDIF (APPLE)

  IF (WIN32)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDrawPython 
                           vtkEditorGeometryDraw
                           vtkIOPython
                           vtkGraphicsPython
                           vtkImagingPython
                           vtkFilteringPython
                           vtkCommonPython
                           debug ${PYTHON_DEBUG_LIBRARY} 
                           optimized ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
  ELSE (WIN32)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDrawPython 
                           vtkEditorGeometryDrawPython 
                           vtkIOPython
                           vtkGraphicsPython
                           vtkImagingPython
                           vtkFilteringPython
                           vtkCommonPython
                           ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
  ENDIF (WIN32)

  IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDrawPython vtkHybridPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

  IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDrawPython vtkParallelPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

  IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDrawPython vtkPatentedPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

  IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDrawPython vtkRenderingPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)

ENDIF (VTK_WRAP_PYTHON AND VTKEDITORGEOMETRYDRAW_WRAP_PYTHON)

#
# Create the vtkEditorGeometryDraw Java library
#

IF (VTK_WRAP_JAVA AND VTKEDITORGEOMETRYDRAW_WRAP_JAVA)

  VTK_WRAP_JAVA (vtkEditorGeometryDrawJava EditorGeometryDrawJava_SRCS ${LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS})
  ADD_LIBRARY (vtkEditorGeometryDrawJava SHARED ${EditorGeometryDrawJava_SRCS})
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDrawJava 
                         vtkEditorGeometryDraw
                         vtkIOJava
                         vtkGraphicsJava
                         vtkImagingJava 
                         vtkFilteringJava
                         vtkCommonJava)
  IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDrawJava vtkHybridJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

  IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDrawJava vtkParallelJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

  IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDrawJava vtkPatentedJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

  IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDrawJava vtkRenderingJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)

ENDIF (VTK_WRAP_JAVA AND VTKEDITORGEOMETRYDRAW_WRAP_JAVA)

#
# Link to VTK and local
#

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (
  vtkEditorGeometryDraw
  vtkIO
  vtkGraphics
  vtkImaging 
  vtkFiltering
  vtkCommon
)

IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDraw vtkHybrid)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDraw vtkParallel)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDraw vtkPatented)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkEditorGeometryDraw vtkRendering)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
